task.summary: 4h Later... * Changed Grid/GridController/GridView to match the MVC * Updated Piece to be more functional (not tested) * Update Engine & EngineListener * Added AbstractModel & GameState

1h later...
* The grid is now functional ! A piece can be placed without overlap another piece, and also can be moved!

1h later...
* Tried to make Piece.rotateAnticlockwise90 but it does work for n*m matrices (n != m) * A bug occurred : When a piece has been rotated, it can go through other pieces * Fixed StackOverflow in Grid.setFocusedPiece (infinite recursive call)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
1h later...
* Tried to make Piece.rotateAnticlockwise90 but it does work for n*m matrices (n != m) * A bug occurred : When a piece has been rotated, it can go through other pieces * Fixed StackOverflow in Grid.setFocusedPiece (infinite recursive call)
